Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $14000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's true value and my desire to ensure you receive an excellent return on your investment. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this innovative solution to your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
